segments.text: I can’t help but shake my head as I watch the boy climb higher toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way his body stretches, reaching eagerly, is both amusing and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In that moment, he's a little explorer on a grand adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the stool wobble, and my heart sinks just a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could urge him to be careful, to step down, but I feel frozen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s placid expression contrasts sharply with the brewing storm of activity behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a beautiful mess, but one that could lead to disaster any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR
